text: Natalie Bible' (born November 9, 1983) is an American film director, screenwriter, editor, and film producer. ==Life and career== Bible' was born and raised in Knoxville, Tennessee. Her first feature film Windsor Drive http://www.screennut.com/supportindiefilm/official-trailer-lands-for-upcoming- mysterythriller-windsor-drive which she directed, edited, and produced was distributed theatrically by Indican Pictures in 2015. The film stars Samaire Armstrong, Tommy O'Reilly, Jillian Murray, Mandy Musgrave, and Matt Cohen.https://www.imdb.com/name/nm4438656/ Bible' is currently working on her second feature William Froste.http://1428elm.com/2015/06/23/william-froste- continues-to-add-iconic-horror-actors-to-its-cast/http://www.joblo.com/horror- movies/news/william-froste-cast-continues-packing-in-the-horror- icons-180/http://www.joblo.com/horror-movies/news/hodder-moseley-mane-and- more-horror-all-stars-assemble-for-william- froste-322http://www.dreadcentral.com/news/104315/william-froste-assembles-a- whos-who-of-horror-veterans/http://www.dreadcentral.com/news/108387/exclusive- monster-sized-william-froste-cast-adds-two-more-horror- legends/http://www.horrorsociety.com/2015/05/28/william-froste-from-the- playbook-of-wes-craven-iconic-cast-is-set-for-horror- film/http://alienbee.net/p-j-soles-and-john-dugan-join-the-cast-of-william- froste/ ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
